summary: A collection of core components for building, training, and running Stable Diffusion models in NeMo, including learning‑rate schedulers, end‑to‑end inference pipelines for text‑to‑image (with SDXL support), sampling helpers, tensor and image utilities, and parallel execution wrappers.
business_intent: Enable rapid development and scalable deployment of AI‑driven image generation services by supplying high‑performance, reusable Stable Diffusion infrastructure within the NVIDIA NeMo ecosystem.
